<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #188: They Watched the Stars](/Sources.aspx?ID=194) pg. 83

**Archetype** [Scions of Domora](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=202)

**Prerequisites**
[Scion of Domora Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=4106); [Spiritual Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=4107)

</column>

---

When you use Spiritual Strike, hit targets become [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) until the end of your current turn. In addition, the additional force damage dealt by the Strike increases by 2d6.
